name: Dice Fight (itch) (Mukhavertolet)
description:
In this simple strategy game you fight an AI opponent using dice!
Everything is decided by a Roll of a Dice, but who said it should be random?

Move and position your dice strategically to defeat you opponent.

Your dice value at the start of your turn defines the number of your steps.
Your dice value in the end of your turn defines shooting distance.

Known issues:
- Bullets can sometimes fail to register collision on low framerate (Download version recommended)
- Opponent may sometimes bump into walls for a long periods of time
